name: They Bite Back
description:
Back Story: You went into town to buy groceries. First stop the candy shop for the real necessities. However, you are met with you favorite treat came to life. Not in the cute adorable way but wanting to consume you instead...

Instructions:

- Shoot gummy bears the size of you. 

- Shoot all 5 to win the game before your health runs out. 

Controls:

-Use keys 1, 2, and 3 to change guns.

-Aim with mouse.

-Zoom and zoom out by pressing the right side of the mouse.

- To jump press space.

-To run hold down on the shift key.

Created through the Games and Interactive Media program at Azusa Pacific University .
